job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: A global platform provider based in Berlin, Germany is seeking a Site Reliability Engineer to help bolster and support their cloud-based service offering. They're looking for someone with experience in Linux, CI/CD pipelines and some coding. Requirements: A solid background and working experience in Software Development and/or Linux Systems Administration role Strong interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills Available to participate in a scheduled on-call rotation Proficient as a Linux Systems Engineer, Linux Administrator, Software Developer, Software Engineer with experience managing large scale Web Services infrastructure Development experience in one or more of the following programming languages: Linux, Python, Bash, Go, Java, C++, or Rust In addition, experience with one or more of the following would be beneficial: Distributed data storage at scale (Hadoop, Ceph) NoSQL at scale (MongoDB clusters, sharded Redis, Cassandra) Data Aggregation technologies. (ElasticSearch, Kafka) Scaling and managing traditional RDBMS (PostgreSQL, MySQL) with High Availability Monitoring & Alerting (Prometheus, Grafana), and Incident Management toolsets Virtual infrastructure and/or container hosting (deployment and management) at scale This position is remote, but once Covid restrictions lift, they will look at a hybrid working model, and they would like candidates who are based near Berlin to pop in for meetings from time to time and catch-ups. Paying between $130 to $140k + Bonus + Benefits Apply now to be considered and for more information!
